full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Temporary Help Services (THS)**
===========================================================

### Mandatory Information

* **Tender Reference:** CB-249-72571786
* **Solicitation Reference:** S5008425
* **Publication Date:** 2024-07-08
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-15 15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Exired

### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting Temporary Help Services (THS) under the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870. This requirement is specifically for Computer Application Support (Stream 5.1) under the Temporary Personnel Services (UNSCLASS) category.

### Eligibility Criteria

Only suppliers listed under the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 and qualified under the mentioned streams and categories may participate in this tender.

### Description of the Requirement

DND requires Temporary Help Services to support its IT operations. This request is addressed to suppliers who have been invited to submit a proposal for the provision of Computer Application Support services.

### Level of Security Requirement

The minimum level of security required for this requirement is Secret.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Email:** CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-G-daide[temporai]re@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 971-7955

### Documents and Attachments

The tender notice and request for proposal can be found on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40429/s5008425--rfp_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40429/s5008425--rfp_1.pdf)

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehesive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Amendments and Cancellations

This tender announcement has been updated on 2024-07-15. The solicitation number remains the same. No cancellations have been made to this tender announcement.
